title: Rishi Sunak – 2018 Comments on Plant Nurseries Being Exempt from Business Rates
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the then Local Government Minister, on 23 May 2018.
content:
Plant nurseries are an essential part of the rural economy and it is vital they are protected.
